## CubicOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CubicOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [breakPoints](./geom-api.cubicopts.breakpoints.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Set to true (default false) to interpret original vertices as breakpoints |
|  [scale](./geom-api.cubicopts.scale.md) | <code>number</code> | Tangent scale factor. Actual length in uniform scaling mode, else should be a value between \[0..1.33333\] |
|  [uniform](./geom-api.cubicopts.uniform.md) | <code>boolean</code> | True, to enable uniform tangent scaling. If false (default), each tangent will be also scaled by the length of its related parent edge in the source shape. |
